column1: 711799,Rope Making Machine Operator,,"Adjust equipment controls to regulate flow of production
column3: Cut fabrics, textiles, leather or hide
column5: Watch equipment in operation to detect malfunctions
column7: Clean materials to prepare them for production
column11: Conduct test runs of production equipment
column15: Feed materials or products into or through equipment
column19: Inspect textile, hide or leather products
column21: Install mechanical components in production equipment
column25: Mount attachments or tools onto production equipment
column27: Notify others of equipment repair or maintenance needs
column29: Operate textile or leather cutting or production equipment
column31: Program equipment to perform production tasks
column39: Set equipment controls to meet cutting specifications
column41: Study blueprints or other instructions to determine equipment setup requirements",nan
